### Error Types

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --------- | ---- | ----------- |
| InvalidUserpass | string | The userpass provided is invalid |
| InternalError | string | An internal error occurred |

  #### ‚ö†Ô∏è Error Responses

  ##### InvalidUserpass

    "mmrpc": "2.0",
